thread.section_title: Econo Lodge Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: SPOT ON!
thread.title_full: SPOT ON! - Review of Econo Lodge Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David M
title: SPOT ON!
text:
My first time in NYC, and I've couldn't stop patting myself on the back for selecting this place. Location, location, location. Yeah, room are small, but who stays in their room all day when ur in NYC? The staff and service makes up for the little extra space. 1 block away from Time Square....Definitely will stay here again.
Room Tip: all rooms have some view, and if your hungry, across the street is a awesome place to have a Great F... See more room tips
